page.pg_title: Tasks to perform under the Wells/Sites Search tab

text_content.paragraph: Under the Wells/Sites tab, you have several options to search for wells and facilities, and to work with the search results.

graphic.alt: Left: Graphic labeled Search Types: My Properties, Details, Location, Dates, Elevation/Depth, Team, A&D, Comments, Job, Production, Event Milestones. Right: Graphic labeled Search Results Interactions: Save a search, Add a property to My Properties, Graph Results, Request Files, Wellbore Schematic, Print Detailsâ€¦, Customize Search results, Excel Export, and Access detailed lease information

page.prompt: CLICK THE NEXT ARROW TO CONTINUE.

cc_text.paragraph: Under the Wells/Sites tab, you have several options to search for wells and facilities, and to work with the search results.
